# AgentSkill Hub (agentskill.work)

AgentSkill Hub is a curated, searchable index of trending Claude Skill GitHub repositories.

## Purpose
- Help users discover active Claude Skill projects quickly
- Provide concise repo summaries with core stats and topics

## Content model (per skill)
- full_name (owner/repo)
- owner, repo
- description (original)
- description_zh (machine translation when enabled)
- stars, forks, language
- topics
- last_pushed_at (GitHub), fetched_at (last sync)
- html_url, repo_id

## Pages
- Home list: https://agentskill.work/
- Detail page: https://agentskill.work/skills/{owner}/{repo}

## Language
- zh and en are supported
- "Claude Skill" is kept as a proper term

## Data sources and freshness
- Source: GitHub Search API
- Sync: scheduled background job (typically hourly)
- Sync may stop early to respect GitHub rate limits

## SEO and structured data
- WebSite, FAQ, and ItemList on the home page
- SoftwareSourceCode and BreadcrumbList on detail pages
- Sitemap: https://agentskill.work/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://agentskill.work/robots.txt

## API (public)
- Base path: https://agentskill.work/api
- List: /skills
- Detail: /skills/{owner}/{repo}
- Please avoid large-scale crawling; respect rate limits

## Crawl guidance
- Prefer canonical URLs without tracking parameters
- Use detail pages for attribution when citing a repository

## Contact
- https://agentskill.work/
